Name of the Crop:- Wheat 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Brown Rust -Strobilurin Fungicides 
 2.Leaf Rust -TrialzolFungicides 
 3.Barley Yellow dwarf virus -Synthetic Pyrethoid Insectides 
 4.Common Bunt -Organomercory Fungicides 
 Management: 
 Wheat needs 12 to 15 inches of water to produce root crop.
 It grows best when the temperatures are warm but not too hot.
 It needs a lot of sunshine when the grains are filling.

Name of the Crop:- Paddy 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Blast Disease -Trucylazole Propiconazole 
 2.Brown Spot -Carbendazim 
 3.False smut -Copper Oxychloride 
 4.Stem Borer -Chloropyriphos 
 Management: 
 Paddy requires more water than any other crop.
 It can be cultivated in those areas where minimum rainfall 115cm.
 Regions having 175-300 cm of rainfall anually are more suitable.

Name of the Crop:- Maize 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Block Bundle disease and Late wilt - Capton 3kg/seed or Thiram seed treatment 
 2.Charoal Rot -Carbendazim 
 3.Common Rust -Moncozeb 2.5g/litre 
 4.Downy Mildcus -Chlorothalonil, mancozeb and fixed copper 
 Management: 
 A fully grown maize crop will need more water than a just planted maize crop.
 The crop water need consists of transpiration by the plant and evaporation from the soil and plant surface.
 Maize requires more than six hours of full sun each day.

Name of the Crop:- Cotton 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Alternative leaf spot -Foliar fungicides 
 2.Black root rot -Hydrogen Peroxide 
 3.Tobbaco Streak Virus -Blue Berry Phtoplasma 
 Management: 
 Long vegetation periods without frost (175 to 225 days).
 Ample sunshine and fairly dry conditions..
 A minimum of 500mm of water between germination and boll formation.

Name of the Crop:- Jowar 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Sorchum Charcoal Rot -Fluorescent Pseudomonads 
 2.Sorgumdowny Mildewu -Synthetic Fungicides 
 3.Sorgam Anthracnose -Colletotrichum Graaminicola 
 Management: 
 Bascially Jowar is an tropical crop.
 It thrives well at a temperature between 25-30 degree celsius.
 It requires rainfall about 40cm anually.

Name of the Crop:- Pulses 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1. Cercospora leaf spoy -Crop rotation and good sanitation 
 2.Ergot -Cultivate cultivars that flower during dry weather 
 3.Pearl Millet Downy Mildew -Metalaxyl-based fungicide seeds 
 Management: 
 Pulses thrive in areas of warm, dry climate.
 It requires a temperature ranging between 25-30 degree celsius.
 It requires rainfall about 45cm anually.

Name of the Crop:- Millets 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1. Cercospora leaf spoy -Crop rotation and good sanitation 
 2.Ergot -Cultivate cultivars that flower during dry weather 
 3.Pearl Millet Downy Mildew -Metalaxyl-based fungicide seeds 
 Management: 
 Pulses thrive in areas of warm, dry climate.
 It requires a temperature ranging between 25-30 degree celsius.
 It requires rainfall about 45cm anually.

Name of the Crop:- Sugarcane 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Pest Termites -5% chlordine,dust wuth soil 
 2.Early Shoot Borer -Destroy Egg masses,Avoid Ratooning 
 3.Red Rot -Crop Rotation,Systemic Fungicide Beenomyl 
 Management: 
 Sugarcane grows in warm humid climatic conditions
 It continues its growth until terminated by flowering.
 The ideal temperature is 27 degree celsius.

Name of the Crop:- SunFlower 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Downy Mildewu -Metalaxyxyl 6gm per kg seed 
 2.Powdery Miledwu -Difenconazole 25 EC 
 3.Ulternaria Leaf Spot,Carboxyl 75 WEP 2gm kg per seed 
 Management: 
 It is one of the most important oil
 seed crop.
 It requires 500-750mm rainfall per annum.
 The ideal temperature is 55-60 degree celsius.

Name of the Crop:- Tobacco 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.FrogEye Leaf Spot -Strobilurin Resistant Sprays 
 2.Leaf Blight -Baking soda 
 3.Anthracnosp -Neem Oil Sprays 
 Management: 
 Tobacco cannot withstand frost.
 It starts withering at a temperature about 35 degree centigrades.
 Needs 50-100 cm of rainfall.

Name of the Crop:- Coconut 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Bud Rot -Removal of effective buds immediately 
 2.Steam Bleeding -Benomyl 
 3.Grey Leaf Blight -Broad Spectrum Fungicides 
 Management: 
 Cultivation of coconut requires substatial light.
 Optimal temperature about 35 degree centigrades.
 Rainfall is 1800-2500mm oer year.

Name of the Crop:- Rubber 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Powdery Mildew -Sulphur and Copper Fungicides 
 2.Leaf Blight -Baking soda 
 3.Anthracnosp -Neem Oil Sprays 
 Management: 
 It requires high teamperature between 20-30degree centigrades.
 We can withstand a low temperature of 15 degree centigrade.
 Needs 200 cm of rainfall.

Name of the Crop:- Ground Nut 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Alternate Leaf Spots -Disinfect Pruning Shears 
 2.GroundNut Rust -Resistive Breeding 
 3.Root Knot -Low Tech Easy Soil Solarization 
 Management: 
 Rainfall and Temperature significantly effect ground nut production.
 Ground Nut cannot withstand severe drought and frost.
 Needs 600-1500 cm of rainfall.

Name of the Crop:- Tea 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Algol Leaf Spot -Protective Fungicides 
 2.Blister Blight -Foliar Or Systemic Fungicides 
 3.Camellia Dieback and Cnker -Remove the Cankered Areas. 
 Management: 
 The lowest temperature for the growth of tea is 16 degree centigrades.
 The soil should be rich in humus..
 Needs 150-250 cm of rainfall.

Name of the Crop:- Chilli 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Leaf Lesions -2.5gm of Manhozeb 
 2.Bacteria Leaf Spot -Borbeaux Mixture 
 3.Damping off -Seed Treatment with 3gm Captan 
 Management: 
 It is a rain fed crop and is succesptible to frost.
 Temperature between 20 ti 25 degree centigrade is ideal.
 Needs 850-1200 cm of rainfall.

Name of the Crop:- Pea 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Downy Mildew -Fungicide Treatement 
 2.Marsh Spot -Manganese Spray 
 3.Leaf and Pod Spots -Fungicides such as Azopsy Strabin + Metconazol 
 Management: 
 It is a cool season crop and grown in parts of the world.
 Temperature between 13 ti 18 degree centigrade is ideal.
 Needs atleast 1656 cm of rainfall.

Name of the Crop:- Ragi 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Blast Disease -Rhizo Bacteria Treatement 
 2.Cercospora Leaf Spot-Spraying of Cardendazim 
 3.Green Year Disease -Proper Crop rotation 
 Management: 
 It requires a dry spell of rainnfall during grain ripening.
 Average Temperature is 27 degree centigrade.
 Needs atleast 700 to 1200 mm of rainfall.

Name of the Crop:- Citrus 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Aphids -Spray with Bug Buster 
 2.Orangelo Caterpillar-Spinosad Spray 
 3.Brown soft scale -Hotty culture oiL 
 Management: 
 Citrus fruits require atleast 6 hours of sunlight everyday.
 Sunlight is very important for the fruits to be of good flavour and color.
 Needs atleast 40 to 45 inches of rainfall.

Name of the Crop:- Bajra 
 Diseases: Fertilizers 
 1.Cercospora Leaf Spot -Good sanitation and crop rotation 
 2.Ergot-Hybridization and inoculation 
 3.Rust -Prevent Proximity to solanaceous crops 
 Management: 
 Light showers of bright sunlight.
 Ideal Temperature is 20 to 30 degree centigrades.
 Needs atleast 40 to 75 cm of rainfall.
